name: Sock Monkey Counting Game
description:
A fun way for your child to learn their numbers 1 through 10! Not only does it help them recognize the numbers but also helps them learn to count. Great game for in the car or at home and it comes with it's own drawstring bag. This fun set is child durable and machine washable.

The cards are constructed using a brown corduroy material for the front with the back being made using 5 Funky Monkeys by Erin Michaels for Moda. Each of the 10 cards have a number appliqued to the front which have also been stitched in place using a zig zag stitch. These cards are machine washable but i do not recommend drying them- line dry only.

The cards also come in a Sock Monkey cloth drawstring bag which was made using brown corduroy on one side and Monkey'n Round Sock Monkey material by Erin Michaels for Moda. It can be personalized- just let me know at the time of ordering.

name: Vroom, Vroom Baby Boy Set
description:
Vroom, Vroom, arriving onto the scene in a fun Bug Jam set! A fun baby shower gift or a great addition to your little bundles wardrobe.

The set come with a pair of flannel lounge pants and an appliqued onesie. The pants are made out of nice flannel that has car, trucks and other motorized vehicles all over. The cuff on the pants is made using a matching striped flannel with an elastic waistband.

The onesie- brand new- has an appliqued lime green bug driving on a road. The appliques have also been sewn in place for extra durability and to help the appliques maintain their shape when washed.

I do recommend that you do not dry your appliques but since these are sewn on you can throw them in if you would like.

Sizes available-
newborn
0-3 mos
3-6 mos
6-9 mos
12 mos

name: Mocca Peasant top with Pant set
description:
A fun and pretty fall outfit.

The pants are made using Alexander Henry's Mocca with the cuff made using a solid burnt orange. The pants are drawstring from the new "Grow with me" line and will accommodate your child as she grows.

The shirt is a a peasant style long sleeved top made using a solid burnt orange with appliqued flowers on the front using a few solid colors to match the ones in the Mocca print.

Sizes available-
Small- 18 mos to 24 mos

Medium- 2T-3T

Large- 4T-5T

name: Sock Monkey Fun Outfit
description:
This fun Sock Monkey set is perfect for the little monkey in your life. This fun set comes with a pair of drawstring pants and a short sleeved applique shirt.

The pants are made using a durable brown corduroy with the cuffs made using 5 Funky Monkeys by Erin Michaels for Moda. The pants are from a new design line by me called- "Grow with me"- drawstring pants that will grow as your child grows.

The shirt is a short sleeved Sprockets t-shirt with a Sock Monkey appliqued to the front. The sock monkey is made using the same corduroy material as the pants and then stitched in place using a fun zig zag.

Sizes available-
Small- 18 mos to 24 mos; T-shirt- 24 mos

Medium- 2T-3T; T-shirt- 3T

Large- 4T-5T; T-shirt- 5T

name: Baby Doll Blanket with Pillow
description:
This little baby doll blankie with matching pillow is a fun way for you little girl to play mommy with her baby. My little girl kept stealing all of my fabric to cover her baby so now she has her own blankets with pillows to use.

The little blanket is made using Michael Millers- Paper family material with a solid soft black for the back. I also did a fun stitch around the topside of the blanket to finish it off. The blanket measures 16" x 10". The little pillow is made using the same fun printed material along with a soft black backing. It measures 10" x 8".

If you would like a different material or size please feel free to convo me.

Please note baby doll and stroller not included- my little one already said no. :o)
